name: Motaouakel El Maimouni
summary: Highly motivated AI Master student and aspiring Solution Architect with a strong foundation in AI, Data Science, and ERP implementation. Proven ability to develop and deploy intelligent IT solutions, automate workflows, and optimize business processes. Eager to apply technical skills and problem-solving abilities to contribute to the commercial development of innovative technologies.

experience.description: Co-developing strategic AI solutions for intelligent automation and workflow optimization. Supporting deployment architecture, integration with existing systems, and data flow design.

experience.title: ERP Odoo Implementation Intern
experience.description: Implemented Odoo ERP on a local server for a multi-company holding. Designed internal exchange platforms and automated key workflows (purchase, sales, inventory). Worked on server-side deployment and security access for cloud ERP.

experience.title: Check-In and Boarding Agent
experience.description: Two-month role with certification in check-in and boarding. Ensured smooth passenger flow and compliance with aviation regulations.

experience.title: Designer freelance et vendeur sur Redbubble
experience.description: Created and sold original designs online, managing the full process from concept to sale.
